participant_1.name: Jasmine
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and down-to-earth, she is not particularly materialistic but values practicality.
participant_1.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, he loves music and sports, and is currently exploring job opportunities.
participant_2.background: my favourite artist is travis scott. i've one older sister. i like playing basketball. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant.

content.text: Hey! I like shopping ? What about you?
Hey! no, I don't like shopping, but my sister likes it very much
I like to and shop online.
I like sports. I like to shop.
I am so sorry to hear that. What makes it feel better? New York has my heart
